overview.scope: Automated testing of https://google.com's core functionality and user experience
objectives: Verify core search functionality and results accuracy
Ensure optimal performance across different browsers and devices
Validate security features and safe search controls
Test integration with Google services and authentication
Verify accessibility compliance and user experience
Ensure proper error handling and edge cases management

test_cases.title: Basic Search Operation
test_cases.description: Verify that the search function returns relevant results for a basic query
steps: Click on the search input field
Press Enter or click the 'Google Search' button
test_cases.expected_results: Search results should display links about Elon Musk

test_cases.title: Page Load Time Test
test_cases.description: Verify that the Google homepage loads within acceptable time limits
steps: Measure time until page is fully interactive
test_cases.expected_results: Page should load completely within 2 seconds under normal network conditions

test_cases.title: Advanced Search Options
test_cases.description: Verify that advanced search filters and options work correctly
steps: Click on 'Settings' below the search bar
Fill in various filters (language, region, last update, etc)
Verify filter indicators appear in results
Check that results match the specified filters
test_cases.expected_results: Search results should reflect all applied advanced filters and options accurately

test_cases.title: HTTPS Protocol Verification
test_cases.description: Verify that the connection is secure and encrypted
steps: Click on the padlock icon in the address bar
test_cases.expected_results: Valid HTTPS certificate should be present and active

test_cases.title: Invalid Search Query Handling
test_cases.description: Verify appropriate handling of invalid or malformed search queries
test_cases.expected_results: System should handle special characters gracefully and display appropriate message

test_cases.title: Keyboard Navigation Test
test_cases.description: Verify that all functionality is accessible via keyboard
steps: Use Tab key to navigate through elements
Use Enter key to activate buttons and links
Test search functionality using keyboard only
test_cases.expected_results: All functionality should be accessible using keyboard navigation
